mapper.select: SELECT U.RSV_ID , V.VHC_NO , U.COMPLETE_YN , R.RSV_DATE , U.MNG_ID , DC1.DL_CD_NM AS DVC_KIND , DC2.DL_CD_NM AS MAKER , DC3.DL_CD_NM AS INST_LOC , U.COMPLETE_YN , DC5.DL_CD_NM AS PROCE_RST , DATE_FORMAT(U.SEND_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SEND_DATE FROM BM_UPD_LOG U INNER JOIN BM_UPD_RSV R ON U.RSV_ID = R.RSV_ID INNER JOIN BM_DVC_INFO D ON U.MNG_ID = D.MNG_ID INNER JOIN BM_VHC_INFO V ON D.VHC_ID = V.VHC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC1 ON D.DVC_KIND = DC1.DL_CD AND DC1.CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC2 ON D.MAKER = DC2.DL_CD AND DC2.CO_CD = 'DVC_MAKER' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC3 ON D.INST_LOC = DC3.DL_CD AND DC3.CO_CD = 'INST_LOC' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC4 ON DC4.DL_CD = #{completeYn} AND DC4.CO_CD = 'COMPLETE_YN' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC5 ON DC5.DL_CD = U.PROCE_RST AND DC5.CO_CD = 'FTP_RESULT' WHERE U.COMPLETE_YN = DC4.TXT_VAL1 AND DATE_FORMAT(R.RSV_DATE, '%Y-%m') = #{date} GROUP BY D.DVC_ID

SELECT V.RSV_ID , R.RSV_DATE , V.COMPLETE_YN , D.MNG_ID , VHC_INFO.VHC_ID , VHC_NO , CHAS_NO , CORP_INFO.CORP_NM AS CORP_NM , DL_CD6.DL_CD_NM AS AREA_NM , DL_CD5.DL_CD_NM AS MAKER_NM , RELS_DATE , MODEL_NM , DL_CD.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_KIND_NM , DL_CD2.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_TYPE_NM , DL_CD3.DL_CD_NM AS LF_YN_NM , DL_CD4.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_FUEL_NM , VHC_INFO.REMARK , VHC_INFO.USE_YN , V.COMPLETE_YN , DL_CD8.DL_CD_NM AS PROCE_RST , DATE_FORMAT(V.SEND_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SEND_DATE FROM BM_VHC_INFO VHC_INFO LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_CORP_INFO CORP_INFO ON VHC_INFO.CORP_ID = CORP_INFO.CORP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL_CD ON VHC_INFO.VHC_KIND = DL_CD.DL_CD AND DL_CD.CO_CD = 'VHC_KIND' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL_CD2 ON VHC_INFO.VHC_TYPE = DL_CD2.DL_CD AND DL_CD2.CO_CD = 'VHC_TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL_CD3 ON VHC_INFO.LF_YN = DL_CD3.DL_CD AND DL_CD3.CO_CD = 'LF_YN' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL_CD4 ON VHC_INFO.VHC_FUEL = DL_CD4.DL_CD AND DL_CD4.CO_CD = 'VHC_FUEL' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL_CD5 ON VHC_INFO.MAKER = DL_CD5.DL_CD AND DL_CD5.CO_CD = 'VHC_MAKER' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL_CD6 ON VHC_INFO.AREA = DL_CD6.DL_CD AND DL_CD6.CO_CD = 'AREA' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL_CD7 ON DL_CD7.DL_CD = #{completeYn} AND DL_CD7.CO_CD = 'COMPLETE_YN' LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_INFO D ON VHC_INFO.VHC_ID = D.VHC_ID AND D.DVC_KIND = 'CD005' INNER JOIN BM_VOC_RSV_RST V ON D.MNG_ID = V.MNG_ID INNER JOIN BM_VOC_RSV R ON V.RSV_ID = R.RSV_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL_CD8 ON DL_CD8.DL_CD = V.PROCE_RST AND DL_CD8.CO_CD = 'FTP_RESULT' WHERE VHC_INFO.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.MNG_ID IS NOT NULL AND V.RSV_ID IN ( SELECT RSV_ID FROM BM_VOC_RSV_RST WHERE COMPLETE_YN = DL_CD7.TXT_VAL1 GROUP BY RSV_ID ) AND DATE_FORMAT(R.RSV_DATE, '%Y-%m') = #{date} GROUP BY VHC_INFO.VHC_ID, V.RSV_ID ORDER BY VHC_INFO.VHC_ID ASC

SELECT R.RSV_ID , V.VHC_NO , R.COMPLETE_YN , DR.RSV_DATE , DC2.DL_CD_NM AS PROCE_RST , R.MNG_ID , DC3.DL_CD_NM AS DVC_KIND , DC4.DL_CD_NM AS MAKER , DC5.DL_CD_NM AS INST_LOC , DATE_FORMAT(R.SEND_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SEND_DATE FROM BM_DESTI_RSV_RST R INNER JOIN BM_DESTI_RSV DR ON R.RSV_ID = DR.RSV_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_INFO D ON R.MNG_ID = D.MNG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_VHC_INFO V ON D.VHC_ID = V.VHC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC1 ON DC1.DL_CD = #{completeYn} AND DC1.CO_CD = 'COMPLETE_YN' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC2 ON DC2.DL_CD = R.PROCE_RST AND DC2.CO_CD = 'FTP_RESULT' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC3 ON DC3.DL_CD = D.DVC_KIND AND DC3.CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC4 ON DC4.DL_CD = D.MAKER AND DC4.CO_CD = 'DVC_MAKER' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC5 ON DC5.DL_CD = D.INST_LOC AND DC5.CO_CD = 'INST_LOC' WHERE D.DVC_ID IS NOT NULL AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND R.COMPLETE_YN = DC1.TXT_VAL1 AND DATE_FORMAT(DR.RSV_DATE, '%Y-%m') = #{date} ORDER BY V.VHC_NO, DR.RSV_DATE DESC, R.SEND_DATE DESC

SELECT R.RSV_ID , V.VHC_NO , R.COMPLETE_YN , VR.RSV_DATE , R.MNG_ID , DC1.DL_CD_NM AS MAKER_NM , DC2.DL_CD_NM AS DVC_KIND_NM , H.MODEL_NM , DC3.DL_CD_NM AS INST_LOC_NM , R.COMPLETE_YN , DC5.DL_CD_NM AS PROCE_RST , DATE_FORMAT(R.SEND_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SEND_DATE FROM BM_VDO_RSV_RST R INNER JOIN BM_VDO_RSV VR ON R.RSV_ID = VR.RSV_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_INFO D ON R.MNG_ID = D.MNG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_HIST H ON D.DVC_ID = H.DVC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_VHC_INFO V ON D.VHC_ID = V.VHC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC1 ON D.MAKER = DC1.DL_CD AND DC1.CO_CD = 'DVC_MAKER' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC2 ON D.DVC_KIND = DC2.DL_CD AND DC2.CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC3 ON D.INST_LOC = DC3.DL_CD AND DC3.CO_CD = 'INST_LOC' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC4 ON DC4.DL_CD = #{completeYn} AND DC4.CO_CD = 'COMPLETE_YN' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC5 ON DC5.DL_CD = R.PROCE_RST AND DC5.CO_CD = 'FTP_RESULT' WHERE V.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND R.COMPLETE_YN = DC4.TXT_VAL1 AND DATE_FORMAT(VR.RSV_DATE, '%Y-%m') = #{date} GROUP BY D.DVC_ID

SELECT R.RSV_ID , V.VHC_NO , R.COMPLETE_YN , SR.RSV_DATE , R.MNG_ID , DC1.DL_CD_NM AS MAKER_NM , DC2.DL_CD_NM AS DVC_KIND_NM , H.MODEL_NM , DC3.DL_CD_NM AS INST_LOC_NM , R.COMPLETE_YN , DC5.DL_CD_NM AS PROCE_RST , DATE_FORMAT(R.SEND_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SEND_DATE FROM BM_SCR_RSV_RST R INNER JOIN BM_SCR_RSV SR ON R.RSV_ID = SR.RSV_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_INFO D ON R.MNG_ID = D.MNG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_HIST H ON D.DVC_ID = H.DVC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_VHC_INFO V ON D.VHC_ID = V.VHC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC1 ON D.MAKER = DC1.DL_CD AND DC1.CO_CD = 'DVC_MAKER' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC2 ON D.DVC_KIND = DC2.DL_CD AND DC2.CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC3 ON D.INST_LOC = DC3.DL_CD AND DC3.CO_CD = 'INST_LOC' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC4 ON DC4.DL_CD = #{completeYn} AND DC4.CO_CD = 'COMPLETE_YN' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC5 ON DC5.DL_CD = R.PROCE_RST AND DC5.CO_CD = 'FTP_RESULT' WHERE V.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND R.COMPLETE_YN = DC4.TXT_VAL1 AND DATE_FORMAT(SR.RSV_DATE, '%Y-%m') = #{date} GROUP BY D.DVC_ID

SELECT R.RSV_ID , V.VHC_NO , R.COMPLETE_YN , SR.RSV_DATE , R.MNG_ID , DC1.DL_CD_NM AS MAKER_NM , DC2.DL_CD_NM AS DVC_KIND_NM , H.MODEL_NM , DC3.DL_CD_NM AS INST_LOC_NM , R.COMPLETE_YN , DC5.DL_CD_NM AS PROCE_RST , DATE_FORMAT(R.SEND_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SEND_DATE FROM BM_ED_RSV_RST R INNER JOIN BM_ED_RSV SR ON R.RSV_ID = SR.RSV_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_INFO D ON R.MNG_ID = D.MNG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_HIST H ON D.DVC_ID = H.DVC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_VHC_INFO V ON D.VHC_ID = V.VHC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC1 ON D.MAKER = DC1.DL_CD AND DC1.CO_CD = 'DVC_MAKER' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC2 ON D.DVC_KIND = DC2.DL_CD AND DC2.CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC3 ON D.INST_LOC = DC3.DL_CD AND DC3.CO_CD = 'INST_LOC' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC4 ON DC4.DL_CD = #{completeYn} AND DC4.CO_CD = 'COMPLETE_YN' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC5 ON DC5.DL_CD = R.PROCE_RST AND DC5.CO_CD = 'FTP_RESULT' WHERE V.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND R.COMPLETE_YN = DC4.TXT_VAL1 AND DATE_FORMAT(SR.RSV_DATE, '%Y-%m') = #{date} GROUP BY D.DVC_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE BM_DESTI_RSV_RST SET PROCE_RST = 'CD999' , SEND_DATE = NOW() , COMPLETE_YN = 'Y' WHERE RSV_ID = #{item.rsvId} AND MNG_ID LIKE CONCAT(LEFT(#{item.mngId}, 10), '%') ;
